    Note:
        1. 1 <= n <= 10^3
        2. returned tuple has the number of even and odd integer palindromes respectively.
    """
    # Calculate the value of n
    n = int(round(n, 2))

    if (n % 2) == 0:

    return (n % 2, n % 10)
